explanation: [0-0] A man in a yellow shirt is holding a small pink balloon in one hand and a white candy in the other. He smiles at the camera. In front of him is a bottle of cola. There's also a Tik Tok watermark on the left side. The background is a white room with a beige window on the right.

[0-10] The man opens his mouth, pushes the balloon towards the camera to show it, smiles again and puts the candy in front of the camera, then fiddles with the balloon, picks up the candy and prepares to put it into the cola.

[10-19] Then the man puts the candy into the cola and quickly puts the balloon over the mouth of the bottle, revealing a bit of foam. The balloon expands at a speed visible to the naked eye, the man opens his mouth wide and shouts loudly, then laughs out loud. Suddenly the balloon explodes, the man closes his eyes in shock and yells.
